blog.name: i-tried-and-i-loose
blog.title: Thrive for greatness
blog.description: Welcome to the cave of the Great Salamander. Yes, this is my name. I'm very tired, and a young spring chicken.

body:
Me going meta

Shouto is not a brick wall, he

1) Has no fucking shame/filter

2) Doesn’t Know How To Human

Seriously we’re talking about “Hey let’s tell this guy my entire backstory in our first true proper conversation after I declared war on him” like this is not what acting like a brick wall is

And if you’re saying “Yeah but he doesn’t show his emotions,” he was raised by Endeavor. His last remainings of happiness and love were his mother.

Imagine almost a decade without that. Years and years and years of abuse.

What emotions are left to show in the end? Anger, bitterness, sadness; no smile. Just the reserved passive face of someone who couldn’t express himself, probably.

He just needs to learn to smile again (thankfully we saw him smile as a teen once thanks deku)

Imagine almost a decade without that. Years and years and years of abuse.

What emotions are left to show in the end? Anger, bitterness, sadness; no smile. Just the reserved passive face of someone who couldn’t express himself, probably.

And if you’re saying “Yeah but he doesn’t show his emotions,” he was raised by Endeavor. His last remainings of happiness and love were his mother.

Imagine almost a decade without that. Years and years and years of abuse.

What emotions are left to show in the end? Anger, bitterness, sadness; no smile. Just the reserved passive face of someone who couldn’t express himself, probably.

He just needs to learn to smile again (thankfully we saw him smile as a teen once thanks deku)

blog.name: jeremyofalltrades
blog.title: pedanticprince
blog.description: My interests are mainly animation, with some other shows and movies, books, musicals and video games.

body:
I am

freAKING OUT, EXCITE!! This year is gonna be great! We’ve got a new Fruits Basket soon, How to Train your Dragon 3, the next season of MHA in Fall, new Haikyuu!! season in the fall, Haikyuu!’s 3rd season is getting a dub, Love Stage! is getting a dub, there’s a new season of The Dragon Prince and another coming maybe this year, and these are just the things I remember off the top of my head, feel free to add more. This- this is making me so happy and it’s great. Get excited!

blog.name: icantkarion
blog.title: Hello My Plums!
blog.description: Kari. 💜 One of the admins for @Macademics. 💜 Currently Watching: Gotoubun no Hanayome & Nanatsu No Taizai 💜

summary: -totally not from macademics- May I request <insert top 3 characters in those Maca-ships> headcanons about how they would spend...
question: -totally not from macademics- May I request <insert top 3 characters in those Maca-ships> headcanons about how they would spend the weekend with their s/o <or asker in the ship if you want>. Let's give the askers a treat.
answer:
To new comers reading this who have no clue, don’t worry about it, continue scrolling and sipping your tea. To followers of the Maca blog, enjoy! 

RIKIDO SATOU x DOODLES

💜 - If it was just a casual hang out date, he would definitely use this blessed opportunity to take Doodles to all of the local sweet shops and patisseries and they would come back with plenty of sweet treats on hand. 

💜 - He would 100% suggest baking together, and both of them would be cute shopping for ingredients and making a mess of the place. Any other members of the household would come back to a scene of cookie scented bliss.

💜 - If it was a sleepover situation, he would be very respectful of boundaries and her parents/guardians. He’s a well mannered young man and he would be very low maintenance to the hosts too. Already having all of his necessities neatly packed so that he doesn’t bother anybody. He’d help her parents with the dish washing. How thoughtful.

💜- If it was a weekend getaway, he would be too nervous if it was his first time on the road with doodles. So i can see him inviting his friends and it would be a group getaway. Though he’d still make time to do couple activities with Doodles when possible. I can see him and her on a boat, waving to Sero who they invited along, Sero and the other boys would be fishing and Satou would be the one preparing the meal and the girls would set the table. They’d all enjoy a sweet meal outside. 


DENKI KAMINARI x REI

💜- He would definitely want to do something active and fun. But he would be lost on ideas. So he’d confide in Mina’s expert advice. Mina suggests taking weekend dance classes at a dance studio she volunteers at. Perfect. He doesn’t even care that he can’t dance, when in Rome, do as the Romans do, so he’d just gonna act like he’s an expert. He surprisingly manages to impress Rei with his newfound grace.

💜- Alternatively, i can see him trying to bond with Rei by asking them to teach him to play the flute. He was chewing gum the first time and choked. After a few rounds he got pretty good, but he’d have to ask Jirou for secret help behind the scenes so he could impress his Rei’cloud.

💜- If he was sleeping over, he would try EVERY move in the book. This one is cheeky. Rei’s parents better watch him. 

💜- If it was a weekend getaway, he’d wanna go somewhere with a beach. Probably to show off, but also because he thinks it’d be romantic to roast marshmallows on the sand by the ocean while watching the night sky.


HIZASHI YAMADA x STEPHANIE

💜- 100% he would wanna go to an extravagant hotel and check out the local night life. He would take Stephanie to all the clubs and events. Maybe a few fashion shows. It’s a date, but it’s also a topic to discuss on his radio show, so it’s killing two birds with one stone. Expect Midnight to tag along for something like this just because it’s her scene, but she would give them privacy too.

💜- If Steph wanted to do something more indoors-y and cute, then mic would offer to make her a full three course meal at his apartment and they could cuddle in front of a cosy fire while watching movies. He’s not a half bad cook. He’d offer to make her anything she liked, as long as it made her happy.

💜- Oh yeah. He’s not a shy person. So he would put all the moves on. They’re consenting adults, so it’s whatever, y’know? Also he’s pretty cheesy with it. Roses and wine. 

💜- If it was a getaway, he’d want to go on a short road trip. They could take turns driving, and there would definitely be some karaoke going on during the ride.
